name: Cudgeler Sweep
text: Your powerful blows can knock down your opponents.
prerequisites: Bludgeoner, Cudgeler Style, base attack bonus +5 or monk level 5th.
benefit: When you hit with a charge attack using the Cudgeler Style feat, you can immediately attempt a single trip combat maneuver check against the target with a +2 competence bonus as a free action. This provokes an attack of opportunity as normal for a trip combat maneuver.
text_zh: 你强力的锤击可以击倒敌人。
prerequisites_zh: 钝击士，蛮锤式，BAB+5或武僧等级5。
benefit_zh: 当你处于蛮锤式流派下冲锋攻击命中时，你可以立刻以自由动作对目标进行一次摔绊战技检定，该次检定获得+2表现加值。这种摔绊战技检定可以正常引发借机攻击。
